entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo 32000 people died due to COVID19 under your watch. Your disastrous policy of sending Corona patients to Nursing homes endangered thousands of lives. Half a million people are infected in NY today. You should be the last person preaching science to the federal government.
